title: LAKE POOLGREEN LIVING  MODERN  FAMILY HOME
description: FAM Properties are proud to bring this majestic 5 bedrooms villa Chorisia 1 Al Barari. An Ideal choice for families!Absolutely stunning contemporary bright and full of light Chorisia offers:* 5 ensuite bedrooms, * an office space * maids room, * Fully equipped kitchen* huge roof terrace wirh breathtaking view,* elevator, * an open living and dining area, * entrance hall, * impressive number of in-build wardrobes,* a covered garage, * an open kitchen that is flexible to be closed with its amenities, * storage room,* a powder room and laundry room* a private pool * Floor to ceiling windows,* Luxury furnished* Brand new construction * handover soon * On liability period from contractorDesigned with a connection to nature at the core, floor-to ceiling glass gazes upon the beautiful central courtyard. The office, kitchen and living spaces open to the interior courtyard and to an outdoor garden and pool. Offering an unprecedented approach to sustainable living where family interaction and development is a focus. On the ground floor, the social areas are distributed, opening onto the mesmerizing courtyard, where the program is extended and joined by means of glass screens. The centerpiece of this beautiful courtyard is Chorisia - a graceful and fascinating tree with long emerald-green pinnate leaves, producing wonderful silk floss blooms in early fall. The central courtyard enables all areas to have a spatial fluidity, offering green views from any point of the house and enhancing the home's airy sense of space. The courtyard also allows a serene and inspiring natural lighting at different times of the year. Finance is available on this particular villa through Fam properties mortgage department. ¶ Property Features: * Built In Wardrobes* Kitchen Appliances* Balcony* Elevator* Brand new* Investment Property* Lake View* Gated Community* Garage* Air Conditioning♣fam PropertiesContact Us - View Contact Detail  Toll free: 800famView Contact Detail  Email: natalia. description: This State of the Art Architectural Masterpiece is a Luxurious Waterfront Development that Offers Unbelievably Stunning Panoramic Views of Sea, Harbour, Palm Jumeirah, Marina Skyline and Bluewaters Island. And this Project has Direct Beach Access. ★ METICULOUSLY CRAFTED ULTRA LUXURY 1 BEDROOM★ BREATHTAKING PANORAMIC VIEWS★ DIRECT BEACH ACCESS★ CAVALLI BRANDED HIGH END FINISHING★ WORLD CLASS AMENITIES★ FLEXIBLE PAYMENT PLAN★ FREEHOLD PROPERTY★ AMAZING LAYOUT★THIS PROJECT IS AN ARCHITECTURAL MASTERPIECEWe are proudly presenting you this Luxurious 1 Bedroom in Damac Bay By Cavalli, Dubai Harbour. ===================PROPERTY FEATURES:===================☆ 1 Bedroom Apartment☆ 2 Bathroom☆ Balcony☆ Size: 700 Sq. feet☆ Best Layout☆ Built-in Wardrobes☆ Branded Kitchen Appliances☆ High End Finishing☆ Dedicated parking Space===================PROJECT AMENITIES:===================★ F&B on the Beach★ Cavalli Private Club★ Wave Pool - Surfing★ Cigar Lounge★ SPA★ Jungle Oasis★ Water Maze★ Juice Bar Integrated in the water Body★ Island with Sunken water seating★ Glass Water Bridge With Cavalli Display★ Fashion Snorkling Pool★ Hammocks with mechanical / Ropeway trays on water★ Hammock Chilling Spot★ Floating Pods in the pool with seating on Roof★ Power and internet provisions for workspaces and meetings★ Garden Walkways in the Sky★ Beach Pool & Landscape Plaza★ Gymnasium===============SELLING PRICE:===============■ SELLING PRICE: AED 2,900,000/-==============PAYMENT PLAN==============■ 20% on booking + 4% DLD■ 60% during construction■ 20% on completion======================DAMAC BAY BY CAVALLI:======================Dubai BAY is one of the most popular destination to stay, play and soak up the sunny Dubai lifestyle. • It is a luxurious waterfront development by Meraas Holding spanning over 20 million square feet; locatednear the major landmarks such as Bluewaters Islands and Palm Jumeriah;• It is a state-of-the-art architectural masterpiece designed to sit at the heart of the neighbourhood andfeatures yacht community centre with yacht brokerage companies, crew placement, ship chandlery andF&B outlets;• It features the largest marina in the MENA region around 700 berths that can accommodate yachts up to160 m in length. The project is currently open for pre-sales only with an official launch expected at the end of 2022. The South Bay community comprises a mix of town houses, semi-detached houses and large stand-alone villas and will be built across a built-up area ranging from approximately 2,900 to 4,800 square feet. The mansions will be located around a one kilometre long crystal lagoon which will have more than 3 kilometres of waterfront promenade as well as multiple beaches for swimming. Amenities will include a community shopping mall, a fitness complex, kids’ clubs, swimming pools, a water sports club, waterfront cafés, a pet park, and a lake park. It Contains A Public Roof Terrace With A BBQ Area, As Well As Central Pedestrian Paths Through Offering A Private Community Entrance. It Also Offers Spectacular Views.
